plot: A documentary on the life and work of Gene Clark, co-founder of The Byrds, whose subsequent career was a rollercoaster of pioneering music and personal disaster.
title: The Byrd Who Flew Alone: The Triumphs and Tragedy of Gene Clark
plot_es: A documentary on the life and work of Gene Clark, co-founder of The Byrds, whose subsequent career was a rollercoaster of pioneering music and personal disaster.
original_name: The Byrd Who Flew Alone: The Triumphs and Tragedy of Gene Clark
plot_en: A documentary on the life and work of Gene Clark, co-founder of The Byrds, whose subsequent career was a rollercoaster of pioneering music and personal disaster.
